function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited historical IEQ data query on mobile interface (less than one day)","Impact":"Reduced ability to analyze long-term trends in IEQ performance","Mitigation":"Develop alternative data collection methods for long-term analysis","Technologies":"Data logging systems for continuous monitoring","People":"Researchers, building managers","Owner":"Research institutions, building management companies"},{"Description":"Subjective bias in IEQ voting module","Impact":"Potential overrepresentation of dissatisfaction with IEQ conditions","Mitigation":"Implement statistical analysis to account for bias, encourage positive feedback","Technologies":"Statistical modeling, feedback incentives","People":"Building occupants, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, building management companies"},{"Description":"Passive acceptance of ratings leading to biased feedback","Impact":"Potential skew towards negative ratings due to passive feedback collection","Mitigation":"Promote active participation, provide incentives for balanced feedback","Technologies":"Incentive systems, interactive feedback interfaces","People":"Building occupants, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, building management companies"}]}
